name: Coldlight Creative Ltd
tagline: A communications agency based in Liverpool
description: Coldlight Creative Ltd is a communications agency based in the heart of Liverpool. They produce amazing graphic design work for online and offline applications. From creative and branding projects to social media applications they strive to create clear and effective work that helps clients boost their profiles to reach new audiences and talk to customers. They work regionally and nationally with clients across public, private, and third-party sectors.
